info.title: Parsio
info.description: Extract and export valuable data from your emails and documents, automatically.

collect_emails.description: collect or not email addresses automatically

get.summary: List table fields in the mailbox
get.description: List table fields in the mailbox

post.description: Create HTML and text documents. If both provided, the HTML content has priority over TEXT content. At least one must be provided.

statuses.description: Document statuses. Accepted values: parsed, fail, skipped, new, quota, parsing, exception.

event.description: trigger event. Accepted values: doc.parsed, doc.parsed.flat, doc.fail, doc.received, table.parsed

table_id.description: Table ID, only for the 'table.parsed' event.
